transArray.content: There was a pungent smell when I first entered the door. I had to open the windows and open the door to allow convection for a while to dissipate the smell.

Thank you for choosing Hanting! I am very ashamed to have left a flaw in your stay experience this time. I would like to apologize to you. I hope you will give us another chance to serve you again. We will give priority to serving you better and wish you a happy life.
